name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
schedule:
September 18/19 Course Introduction
September 25/26 Morphology
October 2/3/9 Syntax
October 10/16 Holiday/no classes
October 17 Midterm exam - 1
October 23/24/30 Semantics
October 30/31 Pragmatics
November 6/7/13/14 no classes
November 20/21 Phonetics
November 27/28 no classes
December 4/5/11 Phonology
December 12 Midterm exam - 2
December 18 Language in Society
December 19 Language Change
December 25 Language Acquisition
December 25/26 Language Processing 
December 26 Computer Processing
January 8 Writing Systems
January 9 Final exam
scorePolicy:
Exams 60% (no make up exam!)
Class Exercises and Quizzes 30% (no late submissions!)
Attendance 10% (90-80-70-60~~)
materials:
Textbook: Fromkin, Rodman, and Hyams. 2014. An Introduction to Language. 10th Edition. Singapore: Wadsworth, Cengage Learning. ISBN 978-1-285-07980-6
=============================================================
Office Hours: Mon/Tues/Wed 9am-11am
Office of International Affairs (1st floor of Second Academic Building)
